attributes.action: not allow the teaching of sex education to children under 12
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Government report recommending that children as young as five be given sex education lessons, which included five-year-olds being taught “the pleasures of gay sex.” 
It’s not just that it sexualises children. Why do you need to teach sex education to five- and six-year-olds?

rejection.details: There is no "Government report" recommending such action.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
